entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this evening and after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
